summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Barton Street from 23rd Avenue Southwest to 25th Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18165 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
